description: This hook is used to get the HopperProviderProps from the nearest HopperProvider ancestor.

This hook is used to get the HopperProviderProps from the nearest HopperProvider ancestor.
It will only return the props that would need to be forwarded to the next HopperProvider.

locale.description:
The BCP47 language code for the locale.
@example "en-US"
locale.name: locale

navigate.name: navigate

useHref.name: useHref

withBodyStyle.description:
Determines whether the styles should be added to the document's body
By default, it is set to `false`. If set to `true`, it will apply additional styling to the document's body.
withBodyStyle.name: withBodyStyle

defaultColorScheme.description: Default color scheme to use when a user preferred color scheme (system) is not available.
defaultColorScheme.name: defaultColorScheme

withCssVariables.description:
Determines whether token CSS variables should be added to the document's head
By default, it is set to `true`, you should not change it unless you want to manage CSS variables via `.css` files
withCssVariables.name: withCssVariables

unsupportedMatchMediaBreakpoint.description: The breakpoint to use when the browser does not support matchMedia.
unsupportedMatchMediaBreakpoint.name: unsupportedMatchMediaBreakpoint
